user_query: I would like to retrieve the user information for the Instagram user with the id '25025320' and get the media id for the post with the link 'https://www.instagram.com/p/CZ7Ma5sNdif/'. Also, provide me with the user feed for the user with the id '25025320'.

TaskList.description: Retrieve user information for the Instagram user with the id '25025320'.
Get the media id for the post with the link 'https://www.instagram.com/p/CZ7Ma5sNdif/'.
Retrieve the user feed for the Instagram user with the id '25025320'.
TaskList.dependency: Step 1 needs to be completed first
